bug.author: GChaudhary
bug.description: On the main page of Tensorflow tutorial for CIFAR-10 i.e. ( <denchmark-link:url>https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/deep_cnn#model_inputs</denchmark-link> ), the links in the section are ALL broken. To be precise, the on clicking them - page says '' Please remove this bug ASAP

comments.comment: They were all moved into another repo <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/models/tree/master/tutorials/image/cifar10>https://github.com/tensorflow/models/tree/master/tutorials/image/cifar10</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/wolffg>@wolffg</denchmark-link> , I've verified this. Could you take a look?
